data.title: Maidstone Studios
data.meta_description: The UK's largest regional independent tv broadcast facility. Providing the most exciting creative television space currently available.
data.text:
“Having to cover the Tour remotely from the UK was something that we hadn’t ever envisaged, but being based at the Studios for 2020 & 2021 coverage was an absolute joy. Their hardworking, supportive and adaptable team provided all the help we could have asked for. We thoroughly recommend the Maidstone Studios.”

Carolyn Viccari

Managing Director - Tour de France - Vsquared TV

"Taking the latest series of This Time with Alan Partridge to Maidstone Studios was a joy from start to finish. It delivered on all our on screen requirements and the studios first class team supported us fantastically throughout"

Dave Lambert

Producer / Director - This Time With Alan Partridge - Baby Cow

"Maidstone Studios is a fantastic facility, not only are you welcomed with open arms but the level of support is next to none. They are honest, hard-working, open minded, easy to work with and have a very supportive approach. I recommend Maidstone Studios to everyone."

Gemma McAllister

Head of Production - Catchphrase - STV

"I have used Maidstone Studios for several years, across a variety of productions. They have top rate facilities and are constantly working to achieve more, the staff are always so helpful and nothing is too much of an ask. Jo, Jordan and team work alongside us from the very beginning of the production and are always communicative and offering helpful logistical and budget friendly suggestions. In the constant changing nature of our shows, and no matter the odd requests we throw their way, the answer is never a no and they always strive to make our show be the best it can possibly be."

Paul McDonagh

Production Manager - I Can See Your Voice - Thames TV

"Gravity Media have been working in partnership with Maidstone Studios for a number of years to provide technical equipment and support to some of the many wonderful shows that have made a home there over the last forty years. Working alongside the studios team is always a genuine pleasure and we look forward to more exciting collaborations in 2022 and beyond."

Meryl McLaren

Director - Gravity Media

"I am always delighted with the level of care that Maidstone Studios gives my productions. It is a lovely place to work, with fantastic studio and office space available. The Maidstone Studio team are always extremely helpful and prepared to go out on a limb to help out. It is also very close to South East London with excellent parking facilities."

Driana Jones

Series Producer - 'Lets Play', 'Mister Maker' and 'I Can Cook' - CBeebies Zodiak Kids and Endemol

"Filming at Maidstone Studios was so smooth running and everyone commented on how great it was to have instant direct access to the studio team so that any requests were seen to immediately. It was friendly atmosphere to work in and we felt so well looked after."

Giulia Lunghi

Production Manager - Catchphrase - STV
